This staff of magically hardened wood is topped with a silver sculpture depicting magical runic symbols. A staff of arcane might is a +2 greater striking staff.

Activateâ€”Sunder 2 (death, force, manipulate)

Effect You destroy the staff, unleashing a blast of arcane power in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30], dealing @Damage[2d8[force]] damage per charge remaining in the staff with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:35|traits:death,force|basic:true] save.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Detect Magic]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Phantasmal Minion]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Everlight]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Force Barrage], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Paralyze]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispelling Globe], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mystic Armor], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Translocate]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fireball], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Force Barrage], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Lightning Bolt]
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Disintegrate], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mystic Armor], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Force]
  • 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Howling Blizzard], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fireball], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Lightning Bolt]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
